scripts.bootstrap: rm -rf ./node_modules && npx -y lerna exec -- rm -rf ./node_modules && npm config set legacy-peer-deps true && npx -y lerna bootstrap --force-local --hoist --no-ci -- --production=false && npx lerna run build-package
scripts.clean: rm -rf package-lock.json && npx -y lerna exec -- rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.clean-bootstrap: npm run clean && npm run bootstrap
